    Instructional Video

    Context

    I created this video as part of a bigger project - SAPâ€™s Open Documentation Initiative. The goal was to explain the process step by step and the benefits for all participants. The project also won a prize in a global, company-internal contest for excellence in user assistance.

    Video published on YouTube

    My role

    • Wrote the video script and got it reviewed by colleagues.
    • Teamed up with a colleague to make the raw video recordings and voice over.
    • Edited and combined together the raw video and audio into a complete video.
    • Added transitions, video effects, graphics, music, and captions as needed.
